reviews.review_msg: Does not answer clearly if you go and ask questions to him. Our class went through an entire algorithms course without ever writing a single line of code. Theoretical and keeps passing snide remarks about engineers in the class. The slides he uses are riddled with inaccuracies and blunders. The quizzes he sets are straight from his slides. Avoid.

He reads the lecture slides in the class which he successfully memorized in last few years.  There are several mistakes in the slides which he never bothered to change ever. I found out the same slides with same mistakes he used back in 2009 (searched over online).
